Name Description

Constructors

EnumVariable(Object, Literal)

Creates a new EnumVariable. Domain need not be specified, because it's implicitly specified by the Enumerated type parameter of the class.

Declaration
public EnumVariable(object name, Literal condition = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Object name

Name of the variable
Literal condition

Condition under which the variable is defined (default always defined)
